title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Thoroughly document the project's requirements, including specific social media platforms to monitor, detailed descriptions of the types of threats/activities to detect (e.g., phishing, hate speech, cyberbullying), expected system functionality (real-time monitoring, alerts, reporting), data privacy and security considerations (encryption, secure data storage), regulatory compliance requirements (GDPR, CCPA), performance and scalability requirements (handling large volumes of data, ensuring real-time processing), and any necessary integrations with third-party services. Also, consider potential future enhancements and expand the scope as needed.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components for data ingestion, processing, analysis, and reporting.

title: Develop Data Ingestion Module
description: Implement the module responsible for collecting data from various social media platforms.

title: Develop Data Processing and Analysis Module
description: Implement the module responsible for processing and analyzing the collected data to detect potential threats or criminal activities.

title: Develop Reporting and Alerting Module
description: Implement the module responsible for generating reports and sending alerts based on the analysis results.

title: Set up Database and Storage
description: Design and implement the database and storage solutions for storing and retrieving collected data and analysis results.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the system adheres to relevant security standards and compliance regulations, including data privacy and ethical considerations.

title: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan to ensure the system meets the defined requirements and functions as expected.

title: Implement Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD)
description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the system.

title: Create User Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive user documentation, including installation guides, user manuals, and troubleshooting instructions.
